languages.text: В систему вошел искаженный силами Архиврага пустотный корабль, приписанный к Райкаду Минорису! Его проклятые вокс-системы прочат миру судьбу, схожую с погибшей планетой.

A voidship twisted by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly part of the Rykad Minoris fleet, has burst into the system! Its cursed vox-systems transmit prophecies of doom, promising the colony the same fate as that which befell the lost planet.
languages.original_text: В систему вошел искаженный силами Архиврага пустотный корабль, приписанный к Райкаду Минорису! Его проклятые вокс-системы прочат миру судьбу, схожую с погибшей планетой.

traits.locale_text: A voidship twisted by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly part of the Rykad Minoris fleet, has burst into the system! Its cursed vox-systems transmit prophecies of doom, promising the colony the same fate as that which befell the lost planet.
A voidship deformed by the Archenemy's dark power and assigned to Rykad Minoris has burst into the system! Your subjects are terrified by the nightmarish apparition.

A voidship twisted by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly part of the Rykad Minoris fleet, has burst into the system! Its cursed vox-systems transmit prophecies of doom, promising the colony the same fate as that which befell the lost planet.
A voidship deformed by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly in the charge of Rykad Minoris, has burst into the system! Your subjects are terrified by the nightmarish apparition.

A voidship twisted by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly part of the Rykad Minoris fleet, has burst into the system! Its cursed vox-systems transmit prophecies of doom, promising the colony the same fate as that which befell the lost planet.

A voidship twisted by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly part of the Rykad Minoris fleet, has burst into the system! Its cursed vox-systems transmit prophecies of doom, promising the colony the same fate as that which befell the lost planet.

A voidship twisted by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly part of the Rykad Minoris fleet, has burst into the system! Its cursed vox-systems transmit prophecies of doom, promising the colony the same fate as that which befell the lost planet.

A voidship twisted by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly part of the Rykad Minoris fleet, has burst into the system! Its cursed vox-systems transmit prophecies of doom, promising the colony the same fate as that which befell the lost planet.

A voidship twisted by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly part of the Rykad Minoris fleet, has burst into the system! Its cursed vox-systems transmit prophecies of doom, promising the colony the same fate as that which befell the lost planet.

languages.text: Un vaisseau qui appartenait à la flotte de Rykad Minoris vient d'arriver dans le système, mais il a été perverti par le pouvoir obscur du Grand Ennemi ! Ses systèmes vox diffusent des prophéties de malheur, promettant à la colonie le même sort que la planète perdue.
languages.original_text: A voidship twisted by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly part of the Rykad Minoris fleet, has burst into the system! Its cursed vox-systems transmit prophecies of doom, promising the colony the same fate as that which befell the lost planet.

traits.locale_text: Un vaisseau qui appartenait à la flotte de Rykad Minoris vient d'arriver dans le système, mais il a été perverti par le pouvoir obscur du Grand Ennemi ! Ses systèmes vox diffusent des prophéties de malheur, promettant à la colonie le même sort que la planète perdue.

languages.text: かつてライカド・ミノリスの艦隊に所属していた、渾沌の勢力の暗黒の力によって変形したヴォイドシップが星系に侵入した！その呪われたヴォクスシステムがコロニーに、失われた惑星と同じ運命を約束する破滅の予言を伝える。
languages.original_text: A voidship twisted by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly part of the Rykad Minoris fleet, has burst into the system! Its cursed vox-systems transmit prophecies of doom, promising the colony the same fate as that which befell the lost planet.

traits.locale_text: かつてライカド・ミノリスの艦隊に所属していた、渾沌の勢力の暗黒の力によって変形したヴォイドシップが星系に侵入した！その呪われたヴォクスシステムがコロニーに、失われた惑星と同じ運命を約束する破滅の予言を伝える。

languages.text: 一艘遭到混沌大敌黑暗之力扭曲的虚空舰闯入了这个星系！这艘船曾是小莱卡德星系的战舰，它遭到诅咒的音阵系统不断散播着末日的预言，声称这个殖民地将会与小莱卡德落得同样的下场。
languages.original_text: A voidship twisted by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly part of the Rykad Minoris fleet, has burst into the system! Its cursed vox-systems transmit prophecies of doom, promising the colony the same fate as that which befell the lost planet.

traits.locale_text: 一艘遭到混沌大敌黑暗之力扭曲的虚空舰闯入了这个星系！这艘船曾是小莱卡德星系的战舰，它遭到诅咒的音阵系统不断散播着末日的预言，声称这个殖民地将会与小莱卡德落得同样的下场。

languages.text: ¡Una nave del vacío corrompida por el poder oscuro del Archienemigo, antaño parte de la flota de Rykad Minoris, ha irrumpido en el sistema! Sus sistemas de vocos malditos transmiten profecías catastróficas, prometiendo a la colonia el mismo destino de su planeta perdido.
languages.original_text: A voidship twisted by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly part of the Rykad Minoris fleet, has burst into the system! Its cursed vox-systems transmit prophecies of doom, promising the colony the same fate as that which befell the lost planet.

traits.locale_text: ¡Una nave del vacío corrompida por el poder oscuro del Archienemigo, antaño parte de la flota de Rykad Minoris, ha irrumpido en el sistema! Sus sistemas de vocos malditos transmiten profecías catastróficas, prometiendo a la colonia el mismo destino de su planeta perdido.

languages.text: Ein von der dunklen Macht des Erzfeinds deformiertes Raumschiff, das einst Teil der Flotte von Rykad Minoris war, ist in das System eingedrungen! Seine verfluchten Voxsysteme übertragen Prophezeiungen des Untergangs und sagen der Kolonie dasselbe Schicksal voraus, das auch der verlorene Planet erlitten hat.
languages.original_text: A voidship twisted by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly part of the Rykad Minoris fleet, has burst into the system! Its cursed vox-systems transmit prophecies of doom, promising the colony the same fate as that which befell the lost planet.

traits.locale_text: Ein von der dunklen Macht des Erzfeinds deformiertes Raumschiff, das einst Teil der Flotte von Rykad Minoris war, ist in das System eingedrungen! Seine verfluchten Voxsysteme übertragen Prophezeiungen des Untergangs und sagen der Kolonie dasselbe Schicksal voraus, das auch der verlorene Planet erlitten hat.

languages.text: Eskiden Rykad Minoris filosunun bir parçası olan, Şerbaşı'nın karanlık gücüyle sapkınlığa kurban gitmiş bir uçsuz gemisi; aniden sisteme giriyor! Lanetli voks sistemleri, kıyamet kehanetleri yayarak koloninin akıbetinin kayıp gezegenle aynı olacağını ilan ediyor.
languages.original_text: A voidship twisted by the Archenemy's dark power, formerly part of the Rykad Minoris fleet, has burst into the system! Its cursed vox-systems transmit prophecies of doom, promising the colony the same fate as that which befell the lost planet.
